notes: Site audience includes minors (13–18). No personal data is collected directly — no registration or contact forms present.
PayPal donate button is an external redirect to PayPal's platform. PayPal acts as an independent data controller for donation transactions; their own privacy policy applies.
Social media links (Instagram, YouTube, Facebook) may result in third-party cookies if users navigate to those platforms.
Non-profit / Christian youth ministry — no e-commerce backend; merch is showcased but purchase flow is not handled on-site.
Three supported locales: EN, RU, ET. All user-facing compliance texts must be provided in all three languages.

cookieBanner.rationale: EU/GDPR mandates informed consent before setting non-essential cookies. Even on a static site, third-party social media links and any potential analytics embed may set cookies.

text.en: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to use this site you accept our use of cookies. For more details, see our Privacy Policy.
text.ru: Мы используем файлы cookie для улучшения работы сайта. Продолжая использовать сайт, вы соглашаетесь с использованием cookies. Подробнее см. в нашей Политике конфиденциальности.
text.et: Kasutame küpsiseid teie kasutuskogemuse parandamiseks. Saidi kasutamise jätkamisega nõustute küpsiste kasutamisega. Lisateave meie privaatsuspoliitikas.

privacyPolicy.rationale: GDPR Article 13/14 requires a privacy notice whenever a website is accessible to EU residents, even if minimal personal data is processed.
keyPoints: Data Controller: MusicJam (non-profit Christian youth ministry, Estonia). Contact: [insert email].
This is a static informational website. No personal data (name, email, etc.) is collected directly through any form or registration on this site.

Donations are processed exclusively by PayPal. When you click the donate button you are redirected to PayPal's platform. PayPal is an independent data controller; please review PayPal's Privacy Policy at paypal.com/privacy.

Social media links (Instagram @musicjam_, YouTube musicjamcamp, Facebook musicjamcamp) redirect to external platforms. Those platforms may set their own cookies and collect data according to their own privacy policies.
The site may use analytics (e.g., page-view statistics). If analytics are enabled, only aggregated, anonymised data is processed. No personally identifiable information is stored.

Audience includes minors (ages 13–18). No personal data is knowingly collected from minors without parental consent. If a parent or guardian believes their child's data has been inadvertently collected, please contact us immediately.
Your rights under GDPR: right to access, rectify, erase, restrict, or object to processing of your personal data. To exercise any right, contact the Data Controller at the address above.
You may also lodge a complaint with the Estonian Data Protection Inspectorate (Andmekaitse Inspektsioon, aki.ee) if you believe your data rights have been violated.
This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. The date of the latest revision will be indicated at the top of the page.

termsOfService.rationale: No user accounts, subscriptions, or on-site purchases. Informational static site with external PayPal redirect. Terms of Service are not legally mandatory in this context, but a brief disclaimer on the site is recommended.

paypal.rationale: The PayPal donate button constitutes a financial transaction trigger. PayPal is regulated as a payment institution (PSD2 in EU). MusicJam itself does not process payment card data or store financial information; all such data is handled by PayPal under their own compliance framework (PCI DSS, GDPR).

recommendedDisclosure.en: Donations are securely processed by PayPal. MusicJam does not store your payment details.
recommendedDisclosure.ru: Пожертвования обрабатываются безопасно через PayPal. MusicJam не хранит ваши платёжные данные.
recommendedDisclosure.et: Annetused töödeldakse turvaliselt PayPali kaudu. MusicJam ei salvesta teie makseandmeid.
